mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, name, email, phone, birth_date, role, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthDate}, #{role}, #{isActive}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, role = #{role}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, password, name, email, phone, birth_date, role, is_active, created_at, updated_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
